data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Online Gaming Pack #8: Undead & Oozes (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This product contains over 200 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales. The tokens are sorted and scaled into different size categories, and are converted for optimal online use.

This token pack includes:

  • Blackwater Slough
  • Blood Ooze
  • Blood Pool
  • Blood Pudding
  • Brown Pudding
  • Cone Ooze
  • Crystal Ooze
  • Deep Blue Ooze
  • Dorje Ooze
  • Flosid
  • Fluttering Ooze
  • 2 Gnishma
  • Golden Crest
  • Grasping Cell
  • Marshlight
  • Mercury Ooze
  • Mustard Jelly
  • Black Pudding
  • Gelatinous Cube

  • Undead Ooze

Released on January 01, 2012. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This product contains over 200 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for hearing background music
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for hearing background music
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
